item.ptxt: Use the same procedures for the RH and LH side.
The procedures listed below are for the LH side.
A bolt without a torque specification is shown in the standard bolt chart (see page ).

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR AXLE SHAFT BEARING AND OUTER RETAINER

s2.ptxt: Install the bearing outer retainer.
Using SST and a press, press in the retainer and a new bearing to the axle shaft.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR AXLE BEARING INNER RETAINER

s2.ptxt: Heat a new inner retainer to about 150°C (302°F).
Using SST and a press, press the inner retainer onto the axle shaft while the inner retainer is still hot.

item.ptxt: Face the non-beveled side of the inner retainer toward the bearing.
Be sure that there is no oil or grease on the rear axle shaft or retainer.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL ABS SPEED SENSOR ROTOR (w/ ABS)

s2.ptxt: Using SST and a press, press in the ABS speed sensor rotor onto the axle shaft.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR AXLE SHAFT INNER OIL SEAL

s2.ptxt: Using SST and a press, press in a new oil seal to the axle shaft.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR AXLE SHAFT OIL SEAL

s2.ptxt: Coat the lip of a new oil seal with MP grease.
Using SST, tap in the oil seal.
Install the gasket to the axle housing with the cutout portion facing downward.
Connect the rear brake to the rear axle housing.
Align the hole of the gasket with the protrusion of the retainer and install the gasket.
Using SST, tap in the axle shaft.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the oil seal.

s2.ptxt: Face the protrusion of the outer retainer downward.
Install the outer retainer mounting with the 4 nuts.
Using SST, connect the brake tube.

atten4.ptxt: Use a torque wrench with a fulcrum length of 30 cm (11.81 in.).

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SPEED SENSOR REAR LH (w/ ABS)

s2.ptxt: Install the speed sensor with the bolt.

item.ptxt: Make sure there are no pieces of iron or other foreign matter attached to the sensor tip.
While inserting the speed sensor into the axle housing hole, do not strike or damage the sensor tip.
After installing the speed sensor, make sure there is no clearance or foreign matter between the sensor stay part and the axle housing.

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 clamps.

atten3.ptxt: When attaching the clamps, do not twist the wire harness.

s2.ptxt: Connect the connector.

item.ptxt: When connecting the connector, do not twist the wire harness.

s2.ptxt: Attach the connector.
Bleed air from the brake line (see page ).

s-1.ptxt: CHECK BRAKE FLUID LEVEL IN RESERVOIR

s2.ptxt: Check the brake fluid level in the reservoir (see page ).

s-1.ptxt: INSPECT AND ADJUST PARKING BRAKE LEVER TRAVEL

s2.ptxt: Inspect and adjust parking brake lever travel (see page ).

s-1.ptxt: CHECK ABS SPEED SENSOR SIGNAL (w/ ABS)

s2.ptxt: Check the ABS speed sensor signal (see page ).
